title: Collaboration-Based Project Design Workshop for Teacher Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: For corporate in-house training instructors: Practicum-focused design utilizing smartphone-based collaboration tools and field-applicable applications

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively design at least one science PBL project with peer teachers.
Learners can propose at least three teacher-student-parent collaboration strategies using digital tools (smartphone apps).
Learners can analyze problem cases from educational settings and derive solutions by competency (self-efficacy, adaptability).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
